response.overview: Min-su and Dong-soo are close friends who have known each other for a long time.They are friends.The day their high school graduation ceremony was just over, Minsu waited for Dongsu at a jajangmyeon restaurant to commemorate graduation.do.However, it was not enough to be late, so Minsu's jajangmyeon was poisoned, and he said nonsense.same number,Min-soo knows and understands Dong-soo, who usually had schizophrenia, so he doesn't want to ruin the difficult meeting.did notHowever, Dongsu's symptoms show no signs of abating.I don't...
response.title: Jajangmyeon is poisonous
